title: No voice FX, Elementalist Lux
body: I recently purchased the Elementalist Lux skin, and when I go into some of the forms, like Dark Lux for example, she stops using her voice lines.  I've tried messing around with the sound settings and reinstalling, but the problem persists.  I've also attempted to find a solution online (searching forums/googling the problem), but I can't seem to find anyone with the same issue.  I was wondering if anyone else might have a solution because I'd love to hear the voice lines of other forms in game.

replies.body: When I had a sound asset not working, a repair resolved it for me.  Since a reinstall didn't help, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Grab some logs through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach it to the ticket so our tech team can take a closer look.  We'll reply back asap!
